142: Night Auditor, Riverbend Work Mode: Onsite Location: Kohler, WI Opportunity Our Riverbend team leads a members-only club offering golf, dining, lodging and spa benefits in a 16th-century English Tudor-style mansion overlooking the Sheboygan River. Specific responsibilities include: Ensuring the safety, security and service of guests and property during the night hours Printing reports for management relating to following days business Checking all reservations expected for following day, ensuring that billing and routing is correct Providing simple food and beverage service for members and guests as requested Regularly checking the house with regard to safety and security issues lights, fires, obstructions etc. Answering telephones and routing calls appropriately This is a full time position, working weekdays and weekends. Typical shifts vary between 8:00pm and 6:00am. Skills/Requirements High school diploma required Prior night audit and guest experience preferred Competency with computers and knowledge of basic accounting functions Applicants must be authorized to work in the US without requiring sponsorship now or in the future.
